评论概述: Love these comfy pants!  Length varies.
评论详情: I absolutely love them, only drawback is you have to figure out which size and length is best. I am 5’7, 135-140 lbs, somewhat of a pear shape, little belly there. In the pictures I am wearing a size Medium, 33” length. I ordered the 33” and 31” and ultimately chose the longer ones because they fit over my thick-soled sneakers, which is what I wear them with most. The reason I gave a 4 instead of a 5 is because I ordered the same size in Navy and as you can see in 4th pic, they are far longer than the black. That is something I read in another review and I will likely reorder the Navy in the 31” length and hope they’re right!  I love the fake pockets on the back so they look like “real” pants for work, and I love the real pockets on the front which can fit my cell phone.  These pants are so comfy and stylish I’d like to wear them every day, which is why I ordered a 2nd pair!

True to size and you can even choose the inseam length !Fabric is smooth as butter , nice deep pockets, and nice enough to wear as part of " professional " workwear". will order a lighter color in the spring. Really nice value

I can’t recommend these enough!

I'm primarily planning on using these as house pants since I work from home, but I would absolutely wear these out to run errands or for travel.
